Label: Room4
Description: Smaller chamber with only exit to the south. Very dank and mossy, probably used to be a jail cell or something like that. There is a skellyman on the ground holding a big key.

Items.Name: Key
Items.Description: It probably unlocks something! That's generally how keys work!

UniqueActions.Text: You pry the key out of the skellyman's hands. 'Oh no... Mr. Key... my only friend...' the skellyman softly sobs.

You eat the caramel popcorn. It tastes alright at first, but then your throat starts to itch. The itching changes to a burning sensation. You look down and see your skin beginning to melt away, leaving nothing but bones behind! UH OH!
You shoot the skellyman again, this time in the skull. His head disintegrates, but a pile of caramel popcorn is revealed inside!
You shoot the skellyman again. 'Now you're just being rude.'
You shoot the skellyman. 'I get that I might be scary looking, but I'm literally already dead and cannot move. That being said, that bullet did just disintegrate a rib, so... ouch?'
You get a good look at the skellyman. He is a puzzle wrapped inside of an enigma. You're not figuring him out anytime soon!
The skellyman says 'You stole my only friend... Mr. Key... *sob*'
The skellyman says 'Don't mind me. I'll just be here forever. See ya!'
The skellyman says 'Oh neat, you killed that dinosaur huh? Finally I can get out of here... or at least I could if I were still alive. Ah well! Life's a beach!'
